name: Escape the planet
description:
This game is created for the Movie Game Jam, and is based on the Through the Planet scene from Lost in Space (1998) 

There are a few things I would do differently from this, one being using Cinemachine to control the camera and character path. Another would be to not be so ambitious in scope.

Controls

WASD + QE

Known Bugs

Camera Shoots rotation seems to change at will.
